name: Rescue Turtle
description:
QUICK! You have to save the fish from the polluted area!
You are a Rescue Turtle and you must save the fish and put them in the aquarium before they become victims to the trash, you're immune, but the fish ARE NOT!

CONTROL (PLEASE READ):
WASD/Arrow Keys: Move
Mouse and Left Click: Make fish attracted (go towards) your cursor.

That's IT! Have fun! Don't forget to donate to Team Seas at https://teamseas.org/! 

Music made by SVL (https://svl.itch.io/rpg-music-pack-svl)
SeaJam Pixelart Logo by Pepperfaced#9999
